CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc IT Department?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc IT Department is arc {Legal Department}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Legal Department?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Legal Department is arc {IT Department}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Legal Department} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Finance Department} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Legal Department to Finance Department in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from IT Department to Legal Department in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between IT Department and Finance Department in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between IT Department and Finance Department is {685}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Finance Department and IT Department in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Finance Department and IT Department is {539}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Legal Department?
SC.A: The total flow output from Legal Department is {1333}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Finance Department?
SC.A: The total flow input by Finance Department is {1606}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 754? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {921} from {Legal Department} to {Finance Department}, a flow of {823} from {Finance Department} to {Legal Department}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 475? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {412} from {Legal Department} to {IT Department}, a flow of {275} from {IT Department} to {Legal Department}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 343 and 754? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {685} from {IT Department} to {Finance Department}, a flow of {539} from {Finance Department} to {IT Department}, a flow of {412} from {Legal Department} to {IT Department}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Finance Department to Legal Department or from IT Department to Legal Department?
NC.A: The flow from {Finance Department} to {Legal Department} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Legal Department to Finance Department, from Finance Department to IT Department, or from Legal Department to IT Department?
NC.A: The flow from {Legal Department} to {Finance Department} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Legal Department}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Finance Department} and {Legal Department}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc IT Department, Arc Finance Department, Arc Legal Department}.
